testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User at home page and click to register tab...........................passed And User enter his valid data to complete register..........................passed And User enter his valid data to Company section............................passed And User enter his valid Password...........................................passed And User clicks on register button..........................................passed Then The Registartion done successfully.....................................passed

testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User at home page and click login Tab.................................passed When User enter his valid data..............................................passed And User click log in button................................................passed Then Back to home page done.................................................passed

testcase.name: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User at home page and click to log in................................passed And User clicks on forget password..........................................passed When User enter his email address...........................................passed And user click Recover Password Button......................................passed Then The Success message is displayed.......................................passed

testcase.name: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given Log in successful.....................................................passed And User enter any product in search field..................................passed When User click on search button............................................passed Then Search has done successful.............................................passed

testcase.classname: User could search home page products using Euro currency
testcase.name: User could switch Tht currency to Euro €
testcase.system-out: Given user log and Navigate to Home.........................................passed When User select euro currency..............................................passed Then user can find euro currency € displayed in Home Page...................passed

testcase.name: user opens facebook link
testcase.system-out: Given user opens facebook link..............................................passed Then "https://www.facebook.com/nopCommerce" is opened.......................passed

testcase.name: user opens twitter link
testcase.system-out: Given user opens twitter link...............................................passed Then "https://twitter.com/nopCommerce" is opened............................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user opens youtube link...............................................passed Then "https://www.youtube.com/user/nopCommerce" is opened...................passed

testcase.name: Create successful Order
